short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get inspired with motivational quotes from top millionaires on every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Access carefully curated quotes from renowned business leaders like Jeff Bezos, Oprah Winfrey, Warren Buffett, or Elon Musk. Gain insights on success, entrepreneurship, finance, personal development, and more.

Seamless Dark and Light Mode, adapting automatically to your operating system's theme preference.

Easy Installation:
Add the extension to Chrome.
Open a new tab and click “Keep it” to confirm (see the last image for details).

Troubleshooting:
If the bookmarks bar disappears, press CTRL + SHIFT + B on Windows or CMD + SHIFT + B on Mac.

Zero data collection:
Your browsing experience stays secure and private.

Disclaimer: 
This extension is not endorsed by, affiliated with, or associated with the authors of the quotes presented. The quotes included in this extension are selected from publicly available sources, such as interviews, speeches, and published materials, and are provided for motivational and educational purposes only. All quotes are correctly attributed to their respective authors.
